dialogues.text: Hoo! My brains beat, so much to keep track off and so many things all at once!
Mhm! And you made it through. Great job! I'm glad to have a tough trainee.
Well once again, I couldn’t have done it without your guidance teach. Thanks.
Nonsense! The knowledge was always within you. I merely lit the spark. Now go on—bask in your biochemical brilliance.
